QuestData.Title: We Don't Negotiate with Primalists
QuestData.Description:
The Primalists thought they were able to overcome the might of Tyr. They were wrong.
My refti were able to track down the Primalists to a cave not far from here. As I thought, they have the missing keystones.
Champion, if we are to restore the reservoir, we must get those keystones back.
Furthermore, their leader must be slain so that they won't attempt a second assault.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Primalist Leader Ko'jo and retrieve the Missing Keystones in Tyrhold Reservoir.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $p. Our final task of restoring the wards awaits.
